channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jonas Brothers’ Guitar Technician Defends Nick Against Skepticism He’s Not Playing Live in Concert
item.description: "I can assure you at all times his guitar is connected," wrote Michael Moschella in an Instagram comment

item.title: Kathie Lee Gifford and Hoda Kotb Surprise Sheinelle Jones by Passing a 'Wine Torch' on “Today with Jenna & Sheinelle ”Premiere
item.description: Both Gifford and Kotb have co-hosted different iterations of the fourth hour of 'Today'

item.title: Teyana Taylor Says She's 'Still Gagging' After Winning Her First Golden Globe: 'I Don't Take Any of This for Granted'
item.description: The star took home a Golden Globe Award for her performance in 'One Battle After Another'

item.title: Trump Deflects Question on Air Force One by Mentioning Turbulence: 'I'm Looking for Something to Grab, and It's Not Going to Be Karoline'
item.description: "You've put me in a position where there's absolutely nothing to grab," Trump said to reporters during a flight on Sunday, Jan. 11

item.title: Millie Bobby Brown Chokes Up Reading Final Goodbye with David Harbour During “Stranger Things ”Finale Table Read: 'You Became My Dad'
item.description: Brown was emotional as she looked at Harbour while reading their final scene together

item.title: Cardi B Loses It After Stefon Diggs' Patriots Win, Enjoy Mexico, Chargers!
